mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, user_name, user_password, user_email, user_phone, user_gender, user_birth, user_address, user_status, enabled) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userGender}, #{userBirth}, #{userAddress}, #{userStatus}, #{enabled})
INSERT INTO license (license_num, license_date, license_end_date, user_num) VALUES (#{licenseNum}, #{licenseDate}, #{licenseEndDate}, #{userNum})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM user WHERE user_num = #{userNum}
SELECT r.role_name FROM user_roles ur JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userNum}
SELECT user_num, user_id, user_password, enabled, user_status FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
